name: Deploy to VPS

on:
  push:
    branches:
      - main

jobs:
  deploy:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    steps:
      - name: Upload code
        uses: actions/checkout@v4

      - name: Configure SSH key
        run: |
          mkdir -p ~/.ssh
          echo "${{ secrets.SSH_PRIVATE_KEY }}" > ~/.ssh/id_rsa
          chmod 600 ~/.ssh/id_rsa
          eval "$(ssh-agent -s)"
          ssh-add ~/.ssh/id_rsa
          ssh-keygen -F ${{ secrets.HOST }} || ssh-keyscan -H ${{ secrets.HOST }} >> ~/.ssh/known_hosts
        shell: bash

      - name: Deploy to server
        env:
          HOST: ${{ secrets.HOST }}
          USER: ${{ secrets.USERNAME }}
          APP_DIR: /sector_tech
          PORT: ${{ secrets.PORT }}
          G_TOKEN: ${{ secrets.G_TOKEN }}
        run: |
          ssh $USER@$HOST "
            set -e

            echo 'Checking application directory...'
            if [ ! -d '$APP_DIR' ]; then
              echo 'Creating application directory...'
              mkdir -p $APP_DIR
              git clone https://${G_TOKEN}@github.com/boburDev/sector-tech-backend.git $APP_DIR
            fi
            
            cd $APP_DIR
            
            echo 'Updating repository...'
            git fetch --all
            git reset --hard origin/main

            echo 'Setting up environment variables...'
            cat > .env <<EOL
            PORT=${PORT}
            DB_PASSWORD=${{ secrets.DB_PASSWORD }}
            DB_NAME=${{ secrets.DB_NAME }}
            JWT_SECRET=${{ secrets.JWT_SECRET }}
            JWT_SECRET_USER=${{ secrets.JWT_SECRET_USER }}
            EOL

            chmod 600 .env

            echo 'Checking for node_modules...'
            if [ ! -d "node_modules" ]; then
              echo 'Installing dependencies...'
              npm install
            else
              echo 'Skipping npm install, node_modules exists'
            fi

            echo 'Building project...'
            npm run build

            echo 'Checking if PM2 is installed...'
            if ! command -v pm2 &> /dev/null; then
              echo 'PM2 not found, installing...'
              npm install -g pm2
            fi

            echo 'Restarting PM2 process...'
            if pm2 list | grep -q sector_tech; then
              echo 'PM2 process found. Restarting...'
              pm2 restart sector_tech
            else
              echo 'PM2 process not found. Starting a new one...'
              pm2 start dist/index.js --name sector_tech
            fi
          "
        shell: bash
